fn.p: O.S.A is a founder and serves on the scientific advisory board for Agragene. J.E.C. has served as a consultant for Takeda Vaccines, Sanofi Pasteur, Pfizer, and Novavax, is on the Scientific Advisory Boards of CompuVax, GigaGen, Meissa Vaccines, and is the Founder of IDBiologics, Inc. All other authors declare no competing financial interests.

fn.p: Current address: Institut Pasteur de la Guyane, Cayenne, French Guiana
